mapper.select: select f.f_content, fp.fp_code, fp.fp_sum, fp.fp_count, fp.fp_date, fp.fp_ck, fp.fp_ckdate from flea f, flea_pay fp where f.s_id =#{s_id} and f.f_code=fp.f_code

select fp.fp_code,fd.fd_code, fd.fd_name, fd.fd_tel, fd.fd_addr, fd.fd_memo, fd.fd_date, fd.fd_state from flea_pay fp, flea_delivery fd, flea f where fd.fp_code=#{fp_code} and f.f_code=fp.f_code and fp.fp_code=fd.fp_code
